verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> vay-dab-Ber spake יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor. saying

דַּבֵּ֣ר׀ <S%H1696><s%> dab-Ber Speak אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel וְקַ֣ח <S%H3947><s%> ve-Kach and take מֵֽאִתָּ֡ם <S%H853><s%> me-'it-Tam מַטֶּ֣ה <S%H4294><s%> mat-Teh rods מַטֶּה֩ <S%H4294><s%> mat-Teh upon his rod לְבֵ֨ית <S%H1004><s%> le-Veit according to the house אָ֜ב <S%H1><s%> 'av of [their] fathers מֵאֵ֤ת <S%H853><s%> me-'Et כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all נְשִֽׂיאֵהֶם֙ <S%H5387><s%> ne-si-'e-Hem of all their princes לְבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> le-Veit according to the house אֲבֹתָ֔ם <S%H1><s%> 'a-vo-Tam, of their fathers שְׁנֵ֥ים <S%H8147><s%> she-Neim both עָשָׂ֖ר <S%H6240><s%> 'a-Sar ten מַטּ֑וֹת <S%H4294><s%> mat-Tot; his rod אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish thou every man's אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- שְׁמ֔וֹ <S%H8034><s%> she-Mo, name תִּכְתֹּ֖ב <S%H3789><s%> tich-To write עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and מַטֵּֽהוּ׃ <S%H4294><s%> mat-Te-hu. rods

וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et שֵׁ֣ם <S%H8034><s%> shem name אַהֲרֹ֔ן <S%H175><s%> 'a-ha-Ron, Aaron's תִּכְתֹּ֖ב <S%H3789><s%> tich-To And thou shalt write עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on מַטֵּ֣ה <S%H4294><s%> mat-Teh upon the rod לֵוִ֑י <S%H3878><s%> le-Vi; of Levi כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> ki for מַטֶּ֣ה <S%H4294><s%> mat-Teh rod אֶחָ֔ד <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad, for one לְרֹ֖אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> le-Rosh [shall be] for the head בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> beit of the house אֲבוֹתָֽם׃ <S%H1><s%> a-vo-Tam. of their fathers

וְהִנַּחְתָּ֖ם <S%H3240><s%> ve-hin-nach-Tam And thou shalt lay them up בְּאֹ֣הֶל <S%H168><s%> be-'O-hel in the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֑ד <S%H4150><s%> mo-'Ed; of the congregation לִפְנֵי֙ <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before הָֽעֵד֔וּת <S%H5715><s%> ha-'e-Dut, the testimony אֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher I אִוָּעֵ֥ד <S%H3259><s%> 'iv-va-'Ed where I will meet לָכֶ֖ם la-Chem שָֽׁמָּה׃ <S%H8033><s%> Sham-mah. It

וְהָיָ֗ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah, will come הָאִ֛ישׁ <S%H376><s%> ha-'Ish And it shall come to pass [that] the man's אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher whom אֶבְחַר־ <S%H977><s%> 'ev-char- whom I shall choose בּ֖וֹ bo מַטֵּ֣הוּ <S%H4294><s%> mat-Te-hu rod יִפְרָ֑ח <S%H6524><s%> yif-Rach; shall blossom וַהֲשִׁכֹּתִ֣י <S%H7918><s%> va-ha-shik-ko-Ti and I will make to cease מֵֽעָלַ֗י <S%H5921><s%> me-'a-Lai, against אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- תְּלֻנּוֹת֙ <S%H8519><s%> te-lun-nOt from me the murmurings בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel אֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who הֵ֥ם <S%H1992><s%> hem like מַלִּינִ֖ם <S%H3885><s%> mal-li-Nim whereby they murmur עֲלֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-lei-Chem. against

וַיְדַבֵּ֨ר <S%H1696><s%> vay-dab-Ber spake מֹשֶׁ֜ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh And Moses אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel וַיִּתְּנ֣וּ <S%H5414><s%> vai-yit-te-Nu gave אֵלָ֣יו׀ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav and כָּֽל־ <S%H3605><s%> kal- all נְשִֽׂיאֵיהֶ֡ם <S%H5387><s%> ne-si-'ei-Hem and every one of their princes מַטֶּה֩ <S%H4294><s%> mat-Teh rods לְנָשִׂ֨יא <S%H5387><s%> le-na-Si leader אֶחָ֜ד <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad apiece מַטֶּ֨ה <S%H4294><s%> mat-Teh and the rod לְנָשִׂ֤יא <S%H5387><s%> le-na-Si their leaders אֶחָד֙ <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad each לְבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> le-Veit houses אֲבֹתָ֔ם <S%H1><s%> 'a-vo-Tam, according to their fathers' שְׁנֵ֥ים <S%H8147><s%> she-Neim both עָשָׂ֖ר <S%H6240><s%> 'a-Sar ten מַטּ֑וֹת <S%H4294><s%> mat-Tot; their rods וּמַטֵּ֥ה <S%H4294><s%> u-mat-Teh their rods אַהֲרֹ֖ן <S%H175><s%> 'a-ha-Ron of Aaron בְּת֥וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> be-Toch [was] among מַטּוֹתָֽם׃ <S%H4294><s%> mat-to-Tam. the rod

וַיַּנַּ֥ח <S%H3240><s%> vai-yan-Nach laid up מֹשֶׁ֛ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh And Moses אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַמַּטֹּ֖ת <S%H4294><s%> ham-mat-Tot the rods לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; the LORD בְּאֹ֖הֶל <S%H168><s%> be-'O-hel in the tabernacle הָעֵדֻֽת׃ <S%H5715><s%> ha-'e-Dut. of witness

וַיְהִ֣י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi become מִֽמָּחֳרָ֗ת <S%H4283><s%> mi-mo-cho-Rat, And it came to pass that on the morrow וַיָּבֹ֤א <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo went מֹשֶׁה֙ <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh Moses אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- into אֹ֣הֶל <S%H168><s%> 'O-hel into the tabernacle הָעֵד֔וּת <S%H5715><s%> ha-'e-Dut, of witness וְהִנֵּ֛ה <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-Neh and behold פָּרַ֥ח <S%H6524><s%> pa-Rach was budded מַטֵּֽה־ <S%H4294><s%> mat-teh- and behold the rod אַהֲרֹ֖ן <S%H175><s%> 'a-ha-Ron of Aaron לְבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> le-Veit for the house לֵוִ֑י <S%H3878><s%> le-Vi; of Levi וַיֹּ֤צֵֽא <S%H3318><s%> vai-Yo-tze and brought forth פֶ֙רַח֙ <S%H6525><s%> fe-rach buds וַיָּ֣צֵֽץ <S%H6692><s%> vai-Ya-tzetz and bloomed צִ֔יץ <S%H6731><s%> Tzitz, blossoms וַיִּגְמֹ֖ל <S%H1580><s%> vai-yig-Mol and yielded שְׁקֵדִֽים׃ <S%H8247><s%> she-ke-Dim. almonds

וַיֹּצֵ֨א <S%H3318><s%> vai-yo-Tze brought out מֹשֶׁ֤ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh And Moses אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all הַמַּטֹּת֙ <S%H4294><s%> ham-mat-Tot all the rods מִלִּפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> mil-lif-Nei from before יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh, God אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all בְּנֵ֖י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei unto all the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El; of Israel וַיִּרְא֥וּ <S%H7200><s%> vai-yir-'U and they looked וַיִּקְח֖וּ <S%H3947><s%> vai-yik-Chu and took אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish every man מַטֵּֽהוּ׃ <S%H4294><s%> mat-Te-hu. his rod ס sa-Mek

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to מֹשֶׁ֗ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh, unto Moses הָשֵׁ֞ב <S%H7725><s%> ha-Shev again אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מַטֵּ֤ה <S%H4294><s%> mat-Teh rod אַהֲרֹן֙ <S%H175><s%> 'a-ha-Ron Aaron's לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before הָעֵד֔וּת <S%H5715><s%> ha-'e-Dut, the testimony לְמִשְׁמֶ֥רֶת <S%H4931><s%> le-mish-Me-ret to be kept לְא֖וֹת <S%H226><s%> le-'ot for a token לִבְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> liv-nei- against מֶ֑רִי <S%H4805><s%> Me-ri; the rebels וּתְכַ֧ל <S%H3615><s%> u-te-Chal and thou shalt quite take away תְּלוּנֹּתָ֛ם <S%H8519><s%> te-lun-no-Tam their murmurings מֵעָלַ֖י <S%H5921><s%> me-'a-Lai and וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo they will not יָמֻֽתוּ׃ <S%H4191><s%> ya-Mu-tu. from me that they die

וַיַּ֖עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> vai-Ya-'as did מֹשֶׁ֑ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh; And Moses כַּאֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher after צִוָּ֧ה <S%H6680><s%> tziv-Vah commanded יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh [so] as the LORD אֹת֖וֹ <S%H853><s%> o-To כֵּ֥ן <S%H3651><s%> ken so עָשָֽׂה׃ <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Sah. him so did ס sa-Mek

וַיֹּֽאמְרוּ֙ <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-me-Ru spake בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to מֹשֶׁ֖ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh unto Moses לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor; saying הֵ֥ן <S%H2005><s%> hen Behold גָּוַ֛עְנוּ <S%H1478><s%> ga-Va'-nu Behold we die אָבַ֖דְנוּ <S%H6><s%> 'a-Vad-nu we perish כֻּלָּ֥נוּ <S%H3605><s%> kul-La-nu are all אָבָֽדְנוּ׃ <S%H6><s%> 'a-Vad-nu. we all perish

כֹּ֣ל <S%H3605><s%> kol Everyone הַקָּרֵ֧ב׀ <S%H7131><s%> hak-ka-Rev Whosoever cometh any thing near הַקָּרֵ֛ב <S%H7131><s%> hak-ka-Rev near אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to מִשְׁכַּ֥ן <S%H4908><s%> mish-Kan unto the tabernacle יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD יָמ֑וּת <S%H4191><s%> ya-Mut; shall die הַאִ֥ם <S%H518><s%> ha-'Im lo תַּ֖מְנוּ <S%H8552><s%> Tam-nu shall we be consumed לִגְוֹֽעַ׃ <S%H1478><s%> lig-Vo-a'. with dying ס sa-Mek
